homes.listingRemarks: Welcome to 9811 Easton Drive. Nestled on a quiet, peaceful road in the heart of Beverly Hills Post Office, just minutes from Rodeo Drive, Sunset Strip and Beverly Hills, this stunning three-bed, two and a half modern home is exceptional. It has been thoughtfully renovated and meticulously maintained. The oversized two car garage features ample storage and provides direct access to the house. Walk into a pristine living room that features wide plank engineered wood flooring and an open concept, perfect for entertaining. The kitchen features soft-close white shaker cabinets, Carrera quartz counters and a custom glass tile backsplash. The Subzero refrigerator, Wolfe induction cooktop, and Bosc

The ultimate tranquil and private retreat surrounded by a lush canyon and tree canopy in the esteemed Benedict Canyon. Enjoy indoor/outdoor living and dining al fresco while just minutes from the heart of Beverly Hills and the iconic Beverly Hills Hotel. Open floor plan downstairs with an upgraded kitchen plus a half bath (not pictured). Upstairs are two generously sized bedrooms with vaulted ceilings filled with lots of natural light and canyon views. Both bedrooms also boast plenty of closet space and balconies. Primary bedroom includes a walk in closet for additional storage. Freshly painted exterior and EV charger in carport. Close to the famous Sunset Strip, West Hollywood, Rodeo Drive

Enjoy privacy and proximity to the Rodeo Drive, Century City, the Beverly Hills hotel, parks, and hiking trails. This well-appointed home features an open floor plan, a chef's kitchen, a private guest room on the first floor, a custom master bathroom, and private outdoor space.

Bright and airy family room overlooks a spectacular backyard  that features a sparkling pool, spa, waterfall and fire pit that are great for entertaining. A contemporary architectural oasis, 1531 Lindacrest Drive offers gated living with exquisite design details. Enter the 5-bed, 6-bath home via a tranquil walkway where water trickles from a fountain wall. Upon entrance, indoor and outdoor living collide in the expansive great room; the living area includes a large fireplace and the modern, open kitchen features stainless steel appliances and marble countertops. Glass doors reveal the backyard paradise where lush landscaping surrounds the pool, spa, and patio, beckoning afternoons spent lounging in the sun. Three years in the making, this fully RTI project is exceptional value located in prime Trousdale Estates. Ideal for both developer or end user to build their dream home. Located at the end of a quiet road on over half an acre with canyon views. The plans by IR architects boasts an approximately 5,373 SF one-story estate and is designed to capture the essence of indoor/outdoor living, complete with four bedrooms, an internal atrium, infinity edge pool w/ outdoor kitchen, and rooftop deck with serene view. Current home is 3 beds, 4 baths, 3843 Sqft.

Glass walls and open space are signature features of this Matlin  &  Dvoretzky 4-bedroom Mid-Century home. Located at the end of a cul-de-sac in the Trousdale Estates, you are sure to enjoy the oversized pool, lush back yard, and patio with BBQ. One room flows into another giving this home  an ideal layout for entertaining. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances and caesarstone counters. Other features include high ceilings, abundant natural light, off street parking for multiple cars, and privacy. Make this Mid-Century treasure your new home.
